summary: Diff adds a backend migration and updates frontend dish-name image mappings, but the generated image asset files are not present in the diff and the backend migration (and likely seeded URLs) point to different, non-requested image filenames ("dish-indian-*") instead of the specified "dish-*.dim_512x512.png" names.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and add 8 new static 512x512 seafood dish image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the exact specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added PNG assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (only code/text files were added/modified), so the required image files are not evidenced as created.
evidence: <file-diff> summary shows ADDED FILES: backend/migration.mo; MODIFIED: backend/main.mo, frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts, frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json; no `frontend/public/assets/generated/*.png` files listed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update seeded backend menu item imageUrl values in `backend/main.mo` for Chennai Spice menuItemIds 46–53 to `/assets/generated/dish-*.dim_512x512.png` matching the specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: `backend/main.mo` is truncated before any of menuItemIds 46–53 are shown, so there is no evidence the seeded `imageUrl` values for items 46–53 were updated. Additionally, the new migration uses different filenames (`/assets/generated/dish-indian-*.dim_512x512.png`), suggesting the seeded values may also have been updated to non-specified paths or remain inconsistent.
evidence: backend/migration.mo (uses `/assets/generated/dish-indian-...dim_512x512.png` which does not match requested filenames)

missing_requirements.requirement: Migration must update persisted MenuItem.imageUrl values for Chennai Spice seafood menuItemIds 46–53 to the new `/assets/generated/dish-*.dim_512x512.png` paths matching the specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: A migration exists and targets ids 46–53, but it updates them to different, non-requested filenames (adds `dish-indian-` prefix and different slugging for kanava/koonthal), so it does not meet the acceptance criteria of updating to the exact new `.dim_512x512.png` asset paths from Image Requirements.
evidence: backend/migration.mo (e.g., sets id 46 to `/assets/generated/dish-indian-chepala-pulusu.dim_512x512.png` instead of `/assets/generated/dish-chepala-pulusu.dim_512x512.png`; similar for 47–53)

hallucinated_features.description: Migration updates menu items 46–53 to `/assets/generated/dish-indian-*.dim_512x512.png` image URLs (different naming scheme than requested).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly specifies exact filenames like `dish-chepala-pulusu.dim_512x512.png`, `dish-kanava-koonthal-masala.dim_512x512.png`, etc. The diff implements different filenames with an added `dish-indian-` prefix and different slug for kanava/koonthal.
